justification: “We introduce a suit collection paradigm to simulate extended goal pursuit… Participants only receive points when a suit is completed… we investigated human goal persistence patterns in a multitasking setting.”

measured_by: choice patterns in the Suits task
justification: “Participants demonstrate a retrospective bias in temporally extended goal selection… preference toward the max-progress suit was assessed within the Suits task.”

measured_by: switch probabilities within the Suits task
justification: “We further investigated temporal persistence patterns with regard to suit selection… we calculated the proportion of rounds in which participants switched away from the selected option.”
